languages.text: "Захолустная планетка между блеклых звезд. На Лейре десяток местных тиранов грызутся за жалкие пять континентов, но в ход идет все — от яда до {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкеров{/g}". {n}Идира принимается растирать дрожащие пальцы.{/n} "Много лет там не была, но поверьте, скучать не о чем".

traits.locale_text: "Захолустная планетка между блеклых звезд. На Лейре десяток местных тиранов грызутся за жалкие пять континентов, но в ход идет все — от яда до {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкеров{/g}". {n}Идира принимается растирать дрожащие пальцы.{/n} "Много лет там не была, но поверьте, скучать не о чем".

languages.text: "It's an out-of-the-way planetoid between two faint stars. On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g}." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."
languages.original_text: "Захолустная планетка между блеклых звезд. На Лейре десяток местных тиранов грызутся за жалкие пять континентов, но в ход идет все — от яда до {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкеров{/g}". {n}Идира принимается растирать дрожащие пальцы.{/n} "Много лет там не была, но поверьте, скучать не о чем".

On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g}." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."

"It's an out-of-the-way planetoid between two faint stars. On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g}." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."

"It's an out-of-the-way planetoid between two faint stars. On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g}." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."

languages.text: “那是颗偏僻的小行星，位于两颗黯淡的恒星之间。莱拉有十几位暴君，他们没完没了地打仗，就为了争夺五片微不足道的大陆。为了赢得胜利，他们无所不用其极，从毒药到{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}。”{n}伊迪拉绞着颤抖的双手。{/n}“我已经很多年没回过那里了，但相信我，那里没什么值得怀念的东西。”
languages.original_text: "It's an out-of-the-way planetoid between two faint stars. On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g}." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."

traits.locale_text: “那是颗偏僻的小行星，位于两颗黯淡的恒星之间。莱拉有十几位暴君，他们没完没了地打仗，就为了争夺五片微不足道的大陆。为了赢得胜利，他们无所不用其极，从毒药到{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}。”{n}伊迪拉绞着颤抖的双手。{/n}“我已经很多年没回过那里了，但相信我，那里没什么值得怀念的东西。”

languages.original_text: "It's an out-of-the-way planetoid between two faint stars. On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to psykers." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."

languages.text: «Es un planetoide apartado entre dos estrellas tenues. En Leira, una quincena de tiranos locales se pelean por solo cinco continentes, pero usan todo lo que está en su mano para ganar, de venenos a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g}». {n}Idira empieza a apretar sus manos temblorosas.{/n} «Hace muchos años que no lo visito, pero allí no hay nada para mí, de verdad».
languages.original_text: "It's an out-of-the-way planetoid between two faint stars. On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g}." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."

traits.locale_text: «Es un planetoide apartado entre dos estrellas tenues. En Leira, una quincena de tiranos locales se pelean por solo cinco continentes, pero usan todo lo que está en su mano para ganar, de venenos a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquicos{/g}». {n}Idira empieza a apretar sus manos temblorosas.{/n} «Hace muchos años que no lo visito, pero allí no hay nada para mí, de verdad».

languages.text: 「そこは2つの暗い星の間にある、人里離れた小惑星よ。レイラでは、12人の暴君が5つのわずかな大陸をめぐって戦っているの。 でも、彼らは勝つためには何だって利用するわ…毒から、{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}までね」{n}イディラは震える手を振り始めた。{/n}「もう何年も行っていないけど、懐かしいことなど何もないわ」
languages.original_text: "It's an out-of-the-way planetoid between two faint stars. On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g}." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."

traits.locale_text: 「そこは2つの暗い星の間にある、人里離れた小惑星よ。レイラでは、12人の暴君が5つのわずかな大陸をめぐって戦っているの。 でも、彼らは勝つためには何だって利用するわ…毒から、{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}までね」{n}イディラは震える手を振り始めた。{/n}「もう何年も行っていないけど、懐かしいことなど何もないわ」

languages.text: "Es ist ein abgelegener Planetoid zwischen zwei blassen Sternen. Auf Leira streiten sich ein Dutzend lokale Tyrannen um fünf jämmerliche Kontinente, doch sie setzen alles ein, um zu gewinnen — von Gift bis hin zu {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikern{/g}." {n}Idira beginnt, ihre zitternden Hände zu ringen.{/n} "Ich war seit vielen Jahren nicht dort. Es wartet dort aber auch nichts auf mich, glaubt mir."
languages.original_text: "It's an out-of-the-way planetoid between two faint stars. On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g}." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein abgelegener Planetoid zwischen zwei blassen Sternen. Auf Leira streiten sich ein Dutzend lokale Tyrannen um fünf jämmerliche Kontinente, doch sie setzen alles ein, um zu gewinnen — von Gift bis hin zu {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikern{/g}." {n}Idira beginnt, ihre zitternden Hände zu ringen.{/n} "Ich war seit vielen Jahren nicht dort. Es wartet dort aber auch nichts auf mich, glaubt mir."

languages.text: « C'est un planétoïde isolé situé quelque part entre deux étoiles ternes. Sur Leira, une dizaine de tyrans se disputent la souveraineté de cinq minuscules continents. Tous les moyens sont bons pour arriver à leurs fins, du poison jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g},{n}explique Idira en tordant ses mains tremblantes.{/n} Je n'y suis pas allée depuis longtemps, mais croyez-moi quand je vous dis qu'il n'y a rien là-bas qui pourrait me manquer. »
languages.original_text: "It's an out-of-the-way planetoid between two faint stars. On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g}." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un planétoïde isolé situé quelque part entre deux étoiles ternes. Sur Leira, une dizaine de tyrans se disputent la souveraineté de cinq minuscules continents. Tous les moyens sont bons pour arriver à leurs fins, du poison jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g},{n}explique Idira en tordant ses mains tremblantes.{/n} Je n'y suis pas allée depuis longtemps, mais croyez-moi quand je vous dis qu'il n'y a rien là-bas qui pourrait me manquer. »

languages.text: "İki sönük yıldız arasında kalmış, gözlerden uzak bir cüce gezegendir. Leira'yı mesken tutmuş bir düzine yerel tiran, ufacık beş kıta için savaşır durur. Ancak kazanmak için zehirden tut da {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezerlere{/g} kadar aklına gelen her şeyi kullanırlar." {n}İdira, titreyen ellerini sıkmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Yıllardır oraya uğramadım. İnan bana, orada özlemini çektiğim hiçbir şey yok."
languages.original_text: "It's an out-of-the-way planetoid between two faint stars. On Leira, a dozen local tyrants fight over five measly continents, but they use everything they can to win — from poison to {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psykers{/g}." {n}Idira begins wringing her shaking hands.{/n} "I haven't been there in many years, but there's nothing for me to miss, trust me."

traits.locale_text: "İki sönük yıldız arasında kalmış, gözlerden uzak bir cüce gezegen. Leira'da yaşayan bir düzine zorba, ufacık beş kıta üzerine savaşır durur. Ancak kazanmak için zehirden tut da {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezerler{/g}e kadar aklına gelen her şeyi kullanırlar." {n}İdira, titreyen ellerini sıkmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Yıllardır orada bulunmadım ama inan bana, orada hasret duyacağım hiçbir şey kalmadı."
